step_goal: Illuminate the environment to enable visual navigation.
rationale: Illuminating the room is physically required to change the environment's affordance from dark to visible, allowing the agent to identify and navigate to the kitchen resources safely.

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The switch must be mechanically operable to close the electrical circuit.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: Completing the circuit powers the light fixtures, changing the visibility state of the room.

counterfactual_challenge_question: If the switch mechanism was jammed or the circuit lacked power, what would be the physical result of the pressing action?
expected_challenge_outcome: The button would not depress or the light would not activate, leaving the room dark and preventing visual navigation.

failure_reflecting.reason: The agent might fumble in the darkness, missing the specific button hotspot or failing to apply sufficient normal force.
failure_reflecting.recovery_strategy: Slide the hand across the wall panel to tactilely locate the button contours before re-attempting the press.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: Initiation: The right hand makes contact with the light switch panel to locate the button.

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The switch surface must be exposed to allow the hand to apply force.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The hand has established physical control over the switch surface.

hotspot.description: The specific push-button on the wall-mounted switch panel.
hotspot.mechanism: The hand aligns with the button surface to prepare for force application.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: Completion: The button is fully depressed by the finger, triggering the light to turn on.

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The button mechanism must yield to pressure to actuate the switch.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The mechanical actuation closes the circuit, causing the lights to illuminate the room.

hotspot.description: The depressed push-button on the switch panel.
hotspot.mechanism: Applying normal force compresses the internal spring mechanism to close the electrical contact.
